(b^28)+28(b^27)(y^1)+378(b^26)(y^2)+3276(b^25)(y^3)+20475(b^24)(y^4)+98280(b^23)(y^5)+376740(b^22)(y^6)+1184040(b^21)(y^7)+3108105(b^20)(y^8)+6906900(b^19)(y^9)+13123110(b^18)(y^10)+21474180(b^17)(y^11)+30421755(b^16)(y^12)+37442160(b^15)(y^13)+40116600(b^14)(y^14)+37442160(b^13)(y^15)+30421755(b^12)(y^16)+21474180(b^11)(y^17)+13123110(b^10)(y^18)+6906900(b^9)(y^19)+3108105(b^8)(y^20)+1184040(b^7)(y^21)+376740(b^6)(y^22)+98280(b^5)(y^23)+20475(b^4)(y^24)+3276(b^3)(y^25)+378(b^2)(y^26)+28(b^1)(y^27)+(y^28)
